summary: Makes blade of woe to fit in perfectly with my earlier mod Arcane Assassin armor.
descriptionHtml:
So this mod makes bluish recolor on blade of woe and also changes color of iron scabbards into bluish :)

This mod is made for Arcane Assassin Armor http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2853 The one on the pictures :) 

This mod does not require earlier mod in anyway.

!!RECOLORS!! Blade of Woes looks and !!SCABBARD of ALL IRON WEAPONS however you can just take it away from mod if you want to keep your iron scabbard normal!!
author: Scortas
